humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report provides the size of the largest invasive tumor, which is 4.8 cm. According to the rules provided, T2 tumors are more than 2 cm but not more than 5 cm. Therefore, the pathologic T stage for this patient's cancer is T2.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The T stage for cancer is determined by the size of the tumor. In this report, the maximum dimension of the invasive component of the tumor is 4.8 cm. According to the TNM staging system, a T2 stage is given when the tumor is more than 2 cm but not more than 5 cm in size. Therefore, the T stage for this patient's cancer is T2.
